questions.question: First, are you currently a cigarette smoker?

answers.action: TERMINATE RECORD ON TALLY SHEET ERASE AND RE-USE

questions.question: Do you or does any member of your household work in advertising, market research, or for any company which manufactures, distributes, or promotes any tobacco products?

answers.action: ALL MUST BE CIRCLED NO IN Q.2. OTHERWISE TERMINATE RECORD ON TALLY SHEET ERASE AND RE-USE
